Designed to feel welcoming and comfortable, the space blends professional functionality with the warmth of a home environmentâ€”making it easy to focus, collaborate, and feel at ease.' is visible

title: Verify Verification of Employment & Internship Inquiry Page

Verify if 'To request a verification of employment for a current or former Jairosoft employee, please fill up and submit with attached signed and dated authorization from the employee. ' is visible

Verify if 'Jairosoft welcomes internship inquiries from students looking to gain hands-on experience in the industry. To apply, please submit your request with the following required documents: ' is visible

title: Verify Verification of Employment Functionality
steps: Verify if element with selector .bubble-element.Text =.baTwjs and text 'Verification of Employment & Internship Inquiry' is visible using :has-text
Click on element with selector .bubble-element.Text.baTwjs and text 'Verification of Employment & Internship Inquiry' is visible using :has-text
Verify if 'To request a verification of employment for a current or former Jairosoft employee, please fill up and submit with attached signed and dated authorization from the employee.' is visible

Verify if 'Jairosoft welcomes internship inquiries from students looking to gain hands-on experience in the industry. To apply, please submit your request with the following required documents:' is visible
Fill locator('#employment').getByRole('textbox', { name: 'Enter your First Name' }) with 'Bon'
Fill locator('#employment').getByRole('textbox', { name: 'Enter your Last Name' }) with 'Test'
Fill locator('#employment').getByRole('textbox', { name: 'Enter your Request' }) with 'Test Message'
Upload './data/dummy.pdf' to file input with selector '#test1 input[type="file"]'

title: Verify Internship Inquiry Functionality
steps: Verify if element with selector .bubble-element.Text.baTwjs and text 'Verification of Employment & Internship Inquiry' is visible using :has-text
Click on element with selector .bubble-element.Text.baTwjs and text 'Verification of Employment & Internship Inquiry' is visible using :has-text
Verify if 'To request a verification of employment for a current or former Jairosoft employee, please fill up and submit with attached signed and dated authorization from the employee.' is visible

Verify if 'Jairosoft welcomes internship inquiries from students looking to gain hands-on experience in the industry. To apply, please submit your request with the following required documents:' is visible
Fill locator('#internship').getByRole('textbox', { name: 'Enter your First Name' }) with 'Bon'
Fill locator('#internship').getByRole('textbox', { name: 'Enter your Last Name' }) with 'Test'
Fill locator('#internship').getByRole('textbox', { name: 'Enter your OJT Coordinator Full Name' }) with 'Ms. Minchin'
Fill locator('#internship').getByRole('textbox', { name: 'Enter your OJT Coordinator Email' }) with 'rparacuelles@jairosoft.com'
Upload './data/dummy.pdf' to file input with selector '#test input[type="file"]'

title: Verify Contact Us Page
steps: Verify if 'Use our contact form for all information requests or contact is directly using the contact information below.' is visible

title: Verify Get in Touch Functionality
steps: Verify if 'Use our contact form for all information requests or contact is directly using the contact information below.' is visible
Fill 'Bon' into the input with placeholder 'Enter your First Name'
Fill 'Test' into the input with placeholder 'Enter your Last Name'
Fill '99999' into the input with placeholder '201-555-0123'
Fill 'bcueva@jairosoft.com' into the input with placeholder 'Enter your Email'
Fill 'Jairosoft' into the input with placeholder 'Enter your Company'
Fill 'This is a test message' into the textarea with placeholder 'Enter your Message
